author: Tad McGalliard
text: Got a smart growth, redevelopment, revitalization or sustainable communities story to tell?  If so consider submitting a session proposal for the National Brownfields Conference, which is co-sponsored by the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) and ICMA, Now in its 15th year, the event attracts over 5,000 attendees and 200 exhibitors for two and a half days of educational sessions, keynote events, training workshops, and mobile tours. Brownfields 2013 will take place on May 15-17, 2013 in Atlanta, GA.  For more information please contact Grant Sparks at gsparks@icma.org or 202-962-3657 or go directly to www.brownfieldsconference.org to submit an idea.
title: Brownfields 2013 Call for Sessions
